thread.section_title: Hotel Mogador - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: AHMAAAZINGG!
thread.title_full: AHMAAAZINGG! - Review of Hotel Mogador, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah L
title: AHMAAAZINGG!
text: I stayed with my aunt in this hotel back in January, and it did not disappoint. The service, EXCELLENT. Yao jiejie was extremely helpful to us, answering our questions and guiding us to Moulin Rouge etc.. the room was nice and clean, and breakfast, although simple, but it was splendid for me. Overall, would definitely come back here again!
